Information and Credits

Lisenced under the WTFPL. Idea and extension development by Jennings Zhang. "Brain In Pot" icon artwork by Sally Zhao.
The idea started as a project for Bitcamp 2017. Check it out on Github.
Mind Matter uses the chrome.storage.sync API, meaning that your settings will be synced with your Google account.
